pageContent: Objectives: To determine the completeness of the examination of cancer patient cases in a multidisciplinary team meeting (MDTM), to study the factors that can affect this examination and to assess the quality of the MDTM concerning prostate cancer in Tarn.

metaData.source:
Quality of life of patients with prostate cancer treated with surgery or radiation therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9599352/
